text: Patrick Jason Faber (born 21 March 1978) is a Belizean politician. He was the Leader of the Opposition. He formerly was Minister of Education, Youth Sports and Culture. In July 2020 he was appointed the leader of the United Democratic Party, after Prime Minister Dean Barrow stated his plans to retire at the end of his term. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Belizean politicians
title: Patrick Faber
